s1.ptxt: Lift up vehicle and drain front differential oil.
Remove front drive shafts referring to Front Drive Shaft Assembly Removal and Installation:Front .
Remove front suspension frame with front differential referring to Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation .
Remove mounting bolts (3), and then take off front differential (1) from front suspension frame (2).

servinfosub.title: Remounting
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse dismounting procedure for remounting noting the following.

item.ptxt: Tighten each bolts and nuts referring to Front Differential Unit Components:Front , Front Drive Shaft Components:Front and Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Components .
Fill front differential oil referring to Front Differential Oil Change:Front .
